To the King, the humble address of John Pennyman the blessing and peace of God, which passeth all understanding, be with the King for evermore. Pennyman, John, 1628-1706.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
s.n., [London : 1690]
Broadside. Caption title. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
